title: Where's my Ivern???
body:
I bought 2 Hextech Mystery Champion Shard yesterday and got an Ivern shard in loot. However, after I upgraded it into a permanent hero, I cannot find him in my collection and the champion is still in the loot. 
When I tried to unlock him permanently later, again and again, I received a "redeem failed" tip and was told that I have already got an Ivern. 
I cannot unlock Ivern till now.  
How can I get my Ivern?

replies.body: Click redeem, then wait for the shard to disappear from your inventory before you press anything else.
It never disappears... That shard still lying in my loot so far...  What should I do now?
I'm afraid I don't know then, try submitting a ticket to player support.
Thank you very much. The support system works. I have Ivern now.
